translations: adv.合约地；合同性地；契约规定地

phrs.translation: 资产证券化商品之分类, 工具

sentences.sentence: He is contractually bound to another year in Los Angeles.
sentences.translation: 他按照合同得在洛杉矶再呆一年。

sentences.sentence: This year, southern California will receive only 45% of the water it is contractually entitled to.
sentences.translation: 今年南部加利福利亚只能获得原合同中45%的水了。

sentences.sentence: Schmidt: If a customer decides to put it in the us, it's going to stay in the us; we say so contractually.
sentences.translation: Schmidt：如果某个客户决定把数据放到美国，那它就将会放在美国，我们有合约确保我们言出必行。
